snippet: Because Americans tolerate two-year presidential campaigns, they are resigned to the idea that presidents cannot govern in the second half of their final term.
lead_paragraph: Because Americans tolerate two-year presidential campaigns, they are resigned to the idea that presidents cannot govern in the second half of their final term.

headline.main: Lame Duck Period Shouldn't Be a Time to Idle
headline.print_headline: Lame Duck Period Shouldn't Be a Time to Idle
